column4: i gotta quick question. thinking of relocating to berlin from australia. is there much work for ENG speaking FOSS developes(+level2 deutsch in berlin)? Have a healthcare background and can get work in southern germany but my girl is a berliner and we have to be near her mother while she has kids. Berlin did a sprint just recently yeah? Must be some demand...
Look at Libre or something like that.
My pleasure. libre is the word in EU.
